title: Juan Gimenez: The Fourth Power (Humanoids) (1991/2000) (GN''150)
description:
" Mega, a fighter pilot based on Nebula Alpha, is the only one to escape
      with her life after an attack by an enemy patrol. Nebula Alpha is the
      main theatre of a conflict that opposes the Krommiuns to the Planetary
      United States. So begins MegaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s perilous journey across enemy lines.
      Along the way, she saves a member of a flight crew that had come to
      rescue her before being shot down himself. The young man, a doctor,
      reveals to Mega that she has become of utmost importance to their
      leaders in connection with the creation of a new weapon of incredible
      power. They need her for her exceptional mental abilities and they
      will stop at nothing to get her back. " 

     -- <a href=" http://www.humano.com/assets/foreign_rights/science-fiction-2013.pdf" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.humano.com/assets/foreign_rights/science-fiction-2013.pdf</a>



Cover:     <a href=" http://gesserit.000space.com/meta/yuq/users/29/766/1hocFImuNr.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://gesserit.000space.com/meta/yuq/users/29/766/1hocFImuNr.png</a>



Contains:   The Fourth Power (1991, 2000) (Pudgy)
